name: Goblin Head Golf
description:
Goblin Head Golf

Excerpts from "The Great Goblin War":

The Great Warriors had defeaded the goblin army and taken many prisoners.

<What shall we do with the prisoners of war, my liege?>

<We shall show them no mercy, just like they showed us none!>

<...Bbbbut how shall we disperse of them, my liege?>

<We shall rid them of their heads! One by one! By sword and axe! And their heads shall roll... no! FLY through the air across the whole Kingdom!>

<...But, my liege, after the heads have flown, where are we supposed to put them?>

<We shall make holes for the heads!>

<Sounds like an aweful lot of work, my liege, to put allt the heads in holes...>

<We shall make it a contest! Decapitate a goblin and put his head in a hole! If you do really well, you score a... an... a bird thing! Bird-tee. BIR-DEE!>

And thats how the game of Goblin Head Golf was invented. The End.

Goblin Head Golf is a game made for the Miz Jam 1.

For the best experience, download it - works fine in browser though.

Hold [LMB] to charge, release to swing.

[RMB] for next head.

Scroll-Wheel-button press to toggle weapon, [1], [2], [3] also works.

[Esc] to pause.

Feel free to comment and give feedback. 

Source code: https://github.com/GeneralSturgeon/GoblinHeadGolf.

Assets by Kenney, Music and Sound from Zapsplat.
